text: Bramwell Tovey, (11 July 1953 â€“ 12 July 2022) was a British conductor and composer. He conducted for the Vancouver Symphony Orchestra and the Rhode Island Philharmonic Orchestra. He also composed the movie score for Eighteen. Trovey died in Barrington, Rhode Island on 12 July 2022 from a sarcoma at the age of 69.Bramwell Tovey, conductor of Rhode Island Philharmonic Orchestra, dies at 69 ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from sarcoma Category:British conductors Category:British composers Category:Writers from Essex Category:Musicians from Essex Category:People from Ilford
title: Bramwell Tovey
